title: On Certain Quantum Deformations of $gl(N,R)$
abstract: In this paper all deformations of the general linear group, subject to certain restrictions which in particular ensure a smooth passage to the Lie group limit, are obtained. Representations are given in terms of certains sets of creation and annihilation operators. These creation and annihilation operators may belong to a generalisation of the $q$-quark type or $q$-hadronic type, of $q$-boson or $q$-fermion type. We are also led to a natural definition of $q$-direct sums of q-algebras.
